subject: Re: Rosemary Ellen Guiley to talk about Ghost Boxes tonight
author: April Slaughter
full_text:
I am very excited for this! I think it will be a good, informative
show. I was able to deliver the very first of the production
mini-boxes to Rosemary this past Sunday while on the Queen Mary. 

We spent time with all the different devices. The RadioShack Hack was
very surprising!! 

All of this technology is fantastic. So glad to see so many minds
working out there to combine and create ideas.

Have a great show Rosemary!!! :)
